markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 317 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target can walk on air as if it were solid ground. It can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle.
name: Air Walk

text: Air Walk Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 317 4.0 Traditions Divine, Primal Cast somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 5 minutes --- The target can walk on air as if it were solid ground. It can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle.
